original_text: The prince shall not take any of the inheritance of the people, thrusting them out of their property. He shall give his sons their inheritance out of his own property, so that none of my people shall be scattered from his property.”
korean_text: 군주는 백성의 기업을 빼앗아 그 산업에서 쫓아내지 못할지니 군주가 자기 아들에게 기업으로 줄 것은 자기 산업으로만 할 것임이라 백성이 각각 그 산업을 떠나 흩어지지 않게 할 것이니라

sentences.original_text: The prince shall not take any of the inheritance of the people
sentences.korean_translation: 왕자는 백성의 유산을 조금도 취하지 못할 것이며

sentences.original_text: thrusting them out of their property.
He shall give his sons their inheritance out of his own property
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자기 자신의 재산에서 아들들에게 유산을 줄 것이니

sentences.original_text: so that none of my people
shall be scattered from his property.”
sentences.korean_translation: 자기 재산에서 흩어지지 않게 하려 함이라
